verses.verse: Then all the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>forces<s%>, and <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah<s%>, and <S%H3153>Jezaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1955>Hoshaiah<s%>, and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> from the <S%H6996>least<s%> even unto the <S%H1419>greatest<s%>, came <S%H5066>near<s%>,

and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, <S%H8467>Let<s%>, we pray thee, our supplication be <S%H5307>presented<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6419>thee<s%>, and pray for us unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, even for all this <S%H7611>remnant<s%>; for we are <S%H7604>left<s%> but a <S%H4592>few<s%> of <S%H7235>many<s%>, as thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> do behold <S%H7200>us<s%>:
that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> may <S%H5046>show<s%> us the <S%H1870>way<s%> wherein we should <S%H3212>walk<s%>, and the <S%H1697>thing<s%> that we should <S%H6213>do<s%>.

Then <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8085>them<s%>, I have heard <S%H6419>you<s%>; behold, I will pray unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> according to your <S%H1697>words<s%>; and it shall come to pass that whatsoever <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> shall <S%H6030>answer<s%> <S%H5046>you<s%>, I will declare it unto <S%H4513>you<s%>; I will keep <S%H1697>nothing<s%> back from <S%H4513>you<s%>.

Then they <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> be a <S%H571>true<s%> and <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> amongst <S%H6213>us<s%>, if we do not according to all the <S%H1697>word<s%> wherewith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall send thee to <S%H7971>us<s%>.

Whether it be <S%H2896>good<s%>, or whether it be <S%H7451>evil<s%>, we will <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>, to whom <S%H580>we<s%> <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H3190>thee<s%>; that it may be well with <S%H8085>us<s%>, when we obey the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>.
And it came to pass <S%H7093>after<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>.

Then <S%H7121>called<s%> he <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah<s%>, and all the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>forces<s%> that were with <S%H5971>him<s%>, and all the people from the <S%H6996>least<s%> even to the <S%H1419>greatest<s%>,

and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H559>them<s%>, Thus saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, unto whom ye <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to <S%H5307>present<s%> your <S%H8467>supplication<s%> before <S%H6440>him<s%>:

If ye will <S%H7725>still<s%> <S%H3427>abide<s%> in this <S%H776>land<s%>, then will I <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H2040>you<s%>, and not pull you down, and I will <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H5428>you<s%>, and not pluck you up; for I <S%H5162>repent<s%> me of the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that I have done unto <S%H6213>you<s%>.

Be not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> <S%H6440>of<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, of <S%H6440>whom<s%> ye are <S%H3373>afraid<s%>; be not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of <S%H5002>him<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: for I am with you to <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H5337>you<s%>, and to deliver you from his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.
And I will <S%H5414>grant<s%> you <S%H7356>mercy<s%>, that he may have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> upon <S%H7725>you<s%>, and cause you to return to your own <S%H127>land<s%>.
But if ye <S%H559>say<s%>, We will not <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in this <S%H776>land<s%>; so that ye <S%H8085>obey<s%> not the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>,

saying <S%H559><s%>, <S%H935>No<s%>; but we will go into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, where we shall <S%H7200>see<s%> no <S%H4421>war<s%>, nor <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%>, nor have <S%H7456>hunger<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%>; and there will we <S%H3427>dwell<s%>:

now therefore <S%H8085>hear<s%> ye the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, O <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>: Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, If ye <S%H7760>indeed<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> your <S%H6440>faces<s%> to <S%H935>enter<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and <S%H935>go<s%> to sojourn <S%H1481>there<s%>;

then it shall come to <S%H2719>pass<s%>, that the sword, which ye <S%H3373>fear<s%>, shall <S%H5381>overtake<s%> you there in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; and the <S%H7458>famine<s%>, whereof ye are <S%H1672>afraid<s%>, shall follow <S%H1692>hard<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you there in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; and there ye shall <S%H4191>die<s%>.

So shall it be with all the <S%H582>men<s%> that <S%H7760>set<s%> their <S%H6440>faces<s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> <S%H4191>there<s%>: they shall die by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, by the <S%H7458>famine<s%>, and by the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>; and none of them shall <S%H8300>remain<s%> or <S%H6412>escape<s%> <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that I will bring upon <S%H935>them<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: As mine <S%H639>anger<s%> and my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> hath been poured <S%H5413>forth<s%> upon the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, so shall my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> be poured <S%H5413>forth<s%> upon <S%H935>you<s%>, when ye shall enter into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; and ye shall be an <S%H423>execration<s%>, and an <S%H8047>astonishment<s%>, and a <S%H7045>curse<s%>, and a <S%H2781>reproach<s%>; and ye shall <S%H7200>see<s%> this place no <S%H4725>more<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%> concerning <S%H7611>you<s%>, O remnant of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H935>Go<s%> ye not into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3045>certainly<s%> that I have <S%H5749>testified<s%> unto you this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

For ye have dealt <S%H8582>deceitfully<s%> against your own <S%H5315>souls<s%>; for ye <S%H7971>sent<s%> me unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H6419>Pray<s%> for us unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>; and according unto all that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%>, so <S%H5046>declare<s%> unto <S%H6213>us<s%>, and we will do it:

and I have this <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H5046>declared<s%> it to <S%H8085>you<s%>; but ye have not obeyed the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in anything for which he hath sent me unto <S%H7971>you<s%>.

Now therefore <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3045>certainly<s%> that ye shall <S%H4191>die<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, by the <S%H7458>famine<s%>, and by the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>, in the <S%H4725>place<s%> whither ye <S%H2654>desire<s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> to sojourn <S%H1481>there<s%>.
